original_text: Then the Lord sent a wind. It blew in birds called quails from the sea. They fell to the ground everywhere round the camp. There were birds everywhere as far as a person could walk in one day in any direction. They were about 1 metre deep all over the ground.
korean_text: 바람이 여호와에게서 나와 바다에서부터 메추라기를 몰아 진영 곁 이쪽 저쪽 곧 진영 사방으로 각기 하룻길 되는 지면 위 두 규빗쯤에 내리게 한지라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord sent a wind.
It blew in birds called quails from the sea.
They fell to the ground everywhere round the camp.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 새들이 진 주변 땅 곳곳에 떨어졌습니다.

sentences.original_text: as far as a person could walk in one day in any direction.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람이 하루 동안 어느 방향으로든 걸어갈 수 있는 거리까지였습니다.

sentences.original_text: They were about 1 metre deep all over the ground.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 땅 전체에 약 1미터 깊이로 쌓여 있었습니다.
